tool_description: This does a simple validation on a South African ID Number.
name: South African ID No Validator
title: South African ID No Validator

api_list.description: Post Id No to validate (example not valid due to privacy conserns)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bdupreez-south-african-id-no-validator-v1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bdupreez-south-african-id-no-validator-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
